plot: A young man named Giacomino leaves his parents to live on his own, but he quickly finds that it is more difficult than he thought.
title: Vado a vivere da solo
plot_es: A young man named Giacomino leaves his parents to live on his own, but he quickly finds that it is more difficult than he thought.
plot_en: A young man named Giacomino leaves his parents to live on his own, but he quickly finds that it is more difficult than he thought.
